alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 6:04AM PST until January 19 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Snohomish and King Counties, including Stevens Pass and Snoqualmie Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The freezing rain threat will move higher in elevation and mostly confined to the area around Snoqualmie Pass early this morning as continued easterly flow traps colder air at the surface. Expect mostly snow at Stevens Pass. Moisture decreases through the day with only lingering showers thereafter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
